entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 19 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Blowing snow near noon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 early this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 19 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 23.
